isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM DRIVE AXLES: EATON - INSPECTION - AXLE HOUSING INSPECTION

svcproc.title: AXLE HOUSING INSPECTION
svcproc.para: Axle housing inspection and repairs are limited to the following checks or repairs.

step1.para: Visually inspect axle housing for cracks, nicks and burrs on machined surfaces.
Check carrier bolt holes and studs for foreign material.

caution.para: Any damage which affects the alignment or structural integrity of the housing requires housing replacement. Do not repair by welding or straightening. This process can affect the material's properties and cause it to fail completely under load.

svcproc.para: Silicone Rubber Gasket Compound: For more effective sealing, Eaton uses silicone rubber gasket compound to seal the majority of metal-to-metal mating surfaces. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended gasket compounds.
Eaton includes gasket compound and application instructions in many repair parts kits.

It is recommended that this compound be used in place of conventional gaskets. The compound will provide a more effective seal against lube seepage and is easier to remove from mating surfaces when replacing parts.
